atk-s0501a4:2_0: Idāni ekaṁ nāma kinti evamādīnaṁ kumārapañhānaṁ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
atk-s0501a4:2_1: Tesaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṁ karissāma –
atk-s0501a4:3_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṁ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi.
atk-s0501a4:3_2: tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṁ anuññātukāmo attanā adhippetatthānaṁ pañhānaṁ byākaraṇasamatthataṁ
atk-s0501a4:3_3: passanto “ekaṁ nāma ki”nti evamādinā pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0501a4:3_5: Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṁ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a4:6_3: tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṁ ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā.
atk-s0501a4:6_8: tasmā sikkhāpadehi sīlaṁ dvattiṁsākārena taṁgocaraṁ samādhiñca dassetvā samāhitacittassa nānādhammaparikkhārāya
atk-s0501a4:10_1: ekaṁ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṁ ekadhammasmiṁ bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:10_4: “Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:10_9: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti evamādīni cettha suttāni evaṁ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni.
atk-s0501a4:10_11: so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ “ekaṁ nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:10_13: na tu sāsane loke vā aññaṁ ekaṁ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:11_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:11_9: ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṁ veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:12_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”ti evamādīsu paccayo āhāroti vuccati,
atk-s0501a4:12_5: evaṁ paccayaṁ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0501a4:12_7: “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuccamāne “asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā avedanakā”ti vacanato “sabbe”ti vacanamayuttaṁ bhaveyya.
atk-s0501a4:13_6: Na kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kasmā ?
atk-s0501a4:13_11: Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya paññāpetabbattā gāmassa ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu “gāmo daḍḍho”ti evaṁ gehe gāmopacāro siddho,
atk-s0501a4:13_12: evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu “sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ayaṁ upacāro siddhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:13_13: Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca “khaṇe khaṇe tvaṁ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase
atk-s0501a4:13_14: ca mīyase cā”ti vadatā bhagavatā tesu sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:13_15: Yato yena paccayākhyena āhārena sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0501a4:13_16: so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ ekanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:13_17: Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a4:13_18: Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:15_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a4:16_0: Ettha ca “ekaṁ nāma ki”nti ca “kihā”ti ca duvidho pāṭho,
atk-s0501a4:16_5: theriyānampi ayameva pāṭho”ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho.
atk-s0501a4:16_8: Yathā pana “sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena,
atk-s0501a4:16_9: dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedetī”ti evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca vuccati,
atk-s0501a4:16_12: Idha pana ekaṁ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a4:18_0: Evaṁ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati dve nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:18_1: Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:18_3: cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi arūpaṁ “nāma”nti vuccati.
atk-s0501a4:18_4: Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṁ ruppanaṭṭhena cattāro ca mahābhūtā,
atk-s0501a4:18_7: Adhippāyavaseneva cettha “dve nāma nāmañca rūpañcā”ti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:19_12: dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:20_0: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṁ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:22_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a4:24_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:24_1: Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa liṅgānurūpaṁ saṅkhyaṁ dassento “tisso vedanā”ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:24_3: imāsamatthamahaṁ tīṇīti paccemī”ti dassento āhāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:25_12: tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:26_0: Ettha ca “yaṁkiñci vedayitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a4:29_1: sukhasaññaṁ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:31_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a4:33_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati cattāri nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:33_1: Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva cattāro āhārā adhippetā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:34_10: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:35_0: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:36_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:36_7: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:37_0: Idha pana yesaṁ catunnaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti,
atk-s0501a4:37_2: Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a4:39_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṁ hoti,
atk-s0501a4:41_0: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:42_0: “Sadevake, bhikkhave…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a4:43_0: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:44_2: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0501a4:45_0: Ayametesaṁ padattho. Etesaṁ pana ariyasaccānaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:48_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati pañca nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:49_12: pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:50_0: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṁ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṁ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:54_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati “cha nāma ki”nti?
atk-s0501a4:55_10: ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:56_3: channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni viya aciraṭṭhitikato
atk-s0501a4:56_4: tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṁ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṁ katvā maccurājassa adassanaṁ upeti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:58_0: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0501a4:60_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:60_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā,
atk-s0501a4:60_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:60_4: Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:61_2: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha,
atk-s0501a4:63_8: ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:65_4: anekupaddavappaṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītippassaddhisamādhupekkhāsaṅkhātāya dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi,
atk-s0501a4:65_7: nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṁ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:65_9: Yathāvuttappakārāya vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi.
atk-s0501a4:65_10: Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya,
atk-s0501a4:65_11: tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa ariyasāvakassa aṅgabhūtattāpi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0501a4:66_5: sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṁ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:66_6: Evamime satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī hoti,
atk-s0501a4:66_7: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0501a4:67_2: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
atk-s0501a4:69_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati aṭṭha nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:69_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā,
atk-s0501a4:69_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a4:69_3: te dassento “ariyāni aṭṭha maggaṅgānī”ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0501a4:69_5: tasmā tamatthaṁ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:69_6: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:72_5: aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:73_0: Evamayaṁ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:74_6: pañcaṅgikaṁ viya ca tūriyaṁ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:75_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṁ bhindati,
atk-s0501a4:75_3: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0501a4:76_2: sālisūkaṁ vā yavasūkaṁ vā sammā paṇihitaṁ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṁ hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā bhecchati,
atk-s0501a4:76_9: so vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṁ bhecchati,
atk-s0501a4:78_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:78_3: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā.
atk-s0501a4:78_7: atthato pana navavidhānaṁ sattānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:79_2: seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā,
atk-s0501a4:80_0: Purimanayeneva cettha “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:81_12: nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:82_2: Nava sattāvāsā”ti vacanato navasu sattāvāsesu ñātapariññāya dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvadassanaṁ pahāya suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattadassanena
atk-s0501a4:82_3: nibbindamāno tīraṇapariññāya aniccānupassanena virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno anattānupassanena
atk-s0501a4:82_4: sammā pariyantadassāvī pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:85_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati dasa nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:85_1: Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:86_10: ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:87_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṁ anupanetvā aññaṁ byākātukāmo,
atk-s0501a4:87_1: yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a4:87_2: tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_3: tesaṁ adhigamaṁ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:87_4: Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_5: tāni dasaṅgāni “dasa nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a4:88_13: asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā samannāgato hoti. Evaṁ kho,
